content: Yes, the addition of skateboarding to the Olympic program generated a lot of excitement from both athletes and fans alike. Skateboarding has a large and passionate following around the world, and its inclusion in the Olympics is seen as a significant recognition of its value as a sport. The skateboarding events will include park and street disciplines, showcasing the versatility and creativity of the athletes. It will be interesting to see how the sport adapts to the Olympic stage and how different countries perform in this event.
